com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.base

Class AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtomsIncludingEquality

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.grinder.core.constraint.AbstractTheory
      • com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.base.AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtoms
        • com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.base.AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtomsIncludingEquality
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Theory, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractNumericTheory, EqualityTheory

    @Beta
public abstract class AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtomsIncludingEquality
extends AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtoms
    A Theory for constraint theories with binary atoms, including equality. This provides a property for turning off propagation of all literals at single-variable constraint level once the variable is bound.
    Author:
    braz

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        theoryFunctorsIncludingEqualityAndInequality - must include equality and inequality
        atomFunctorsAreUniqueToThisTheory - indicates whether this is the only theory using these functors (for efficiency)
        propagateAllLiteralsWhenVariableIsBound - indicates automatic propagation of value once variable gets bound.
